channel.title: Posts on The Desk Space
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Desk Space

item.title: No more paying overdue charges with Plaid API!
item.description:
Introduction

My credit card was in pain after christmas, and I was not paying attention. I was too invloved with the festivities, spending time with family and friends.

Come January, the aftermath comes crashing through the door. Now is the time to stick to the resolutions made, you look at the reciepts and take a look at your bank statement. And there was a charge from my bank that I there had been no trade for. I had missed my credit card payment deadline and my credit score would be affected. Way to start the new year right?

item.title: Hello there!
item.description:
Welcome to my space!

Don’t mind the look of my desk—it’s just a reflection of all the exciting things happening here. As a software engineer pivoting into cybersecurity, and dabbling in techincal writing, there’s always something new in the mix.

This space will continulaly be developed, so stay tuned and I will show you around later. For now, Here is a project I recently worked on

Introduction to Plaid API Project
